title: Pentair UltraTemp — Preventative Maintenance Checklist
description: Seasonal preventative maintenance for Pentair UltraTemp heat pumps. Includes electrical, refrigerant, and water flow inspection points.

intro.text: Perform all checks with power off unless measurement is required. Record all readings for seasonal tracking.

check_airflow.text: Inspect condenser coil and fan for debris or blockage. Clean coil and ensure unobstructed airflow (≥ 18" clearance).

check_power.text: Measure line voltage at L1–L2 input (expect 220–252 VAC). Within range?

check_transformer.text: Check 24 VAC transformer secondary output. Expect 24–28 VAC under load.

check_flow_switch.text: Run pump and test continuity across flow switch. Should read CLOSED (0 Ω).

check_sensors.text: Measure resistance of water and freeze sensors at ~77°F. Expect ≈ 10 kΩ ±10%. Within spec?

check_contactors.text: Inspect contactor points for pitting or corrosion. Replace if excessive wear observed.

check_capacitor.text: Measure compressor capacitor capacitance (µF). Should be within ±10% of rated value.

check_refrigerant.text: Observe refrigerant pressures during operation. Low side typically 50–70 psi, high side 225–275 psi (at 80–90°F ambient). Within range?

clean_coil.text: Clean condenser coil using coil cleaner and low-pressure water. Re-test airflow after cleaning.

replace_transformer.text: Replace 24 VAC transformer and recheck voltage.

replace_flow_switch.text: Replace flow switch and verify continuity under flow.

replace_sensor.text: Replace defective thermistor (water/freeze). Verify readings at room temp.

replace_contactor.text: Replace compressor contactor and confirm 240 VAC transfer.

replace_capacitor.text: Replace run capacitor and re-measure value.

report_electrical_issue.text: Voltage out of spec. Document readings and contact electrician or Pentair support.

call_refrigerant_service.text: Refrigerant pressures out of range — contact licensed HVAC technician for service.

finalize.text: ✅ UltraTemp PM complete. Record readings and confirm system operation.
